name: BeyondIRC
body:
### Welcome to BeyondIRC
We are a (now) small IRC network which as been around since January, 1997. While the original founders have moved on, we have kept the spirit of BeyondIRC alive for nearly 2 decades.

### Servers
Currently, we have 2 servers:
- Miami, Florida, USA : walle.beyondirc.net
- Montana, USA : whipcrack.beyondirc.net

However, we prefer that you connect to **irc.beyondirc.net** . This will ensure you can easily reconnect should we have a problem with one of our servers.
All servers listen on port 6660-6669 (plaintext) and port 7443 (ssl)

### Chat with us!
Embedded chat coming soon

### Getting Help
If you need help, please feel free to contact us
 - Via IRC: #A-BeyondIRC-Welcome (non-technical) or #Services (technical)
 - Via email: [help@beyondirc.net](mailto:help@beyondirc.net)

### Staff
* enderst : Network Operator, Administrator of whipcrack
* Sthebig : Network Operator, Administrator of walle, Pretend Webmaster
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
